website_summaries.verdict: Give this lightweight dryer a try if you've struggled with the weight of other high-end models.
pros: Tourmaline titanium technology creates brighter, longer-lasting shine
Far-infrared heat dries faster and is easier on hair
High-torque, ultra-lightweight 1900W motor delivers phenomenal drying power

customer_reviews.title: Pretty pearl white
customer_reviews.text: I really like the pearl white color of this blow dryer. I've had this hair dryer for a couple months but I only ever partially dry my hair. (I have thick, wavy hair that looks better air dried) if I was doing a full blow out I would find this dryer to be too heavy but because my drying sessions are short, I enjoy the weight of this model. If you're looking at this model against other BaBylissPRO's I think this is the best value!
customer_reviews.author: Stevie

customer_reviews.title: 5 years of healthy hair!
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight and easy on my hair. I purchased mine in 2012 and am just now replacing it, after five years of 2-3x a week use. My hair is not too thick, with a slight wave, and it's been so much healthier looking after I started using this dryer. (My hair stylist even commented on it!) May not be all you need if you have a lot of thick hair to work through, but it's been a perfect solution for me.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: False Advertising, no 24-month warranty! Product will BREAK in first year with no way to return.
customer_reviews.text: Product worked great for six-months. Then the product would not turn on anymore. It has a 24-month warranty, however, you cannot contact anyone to actually return the item and use the warranty for repair. Amazon provides a link, but the link is a French website that does not have an English feature. However, even on the website after using Google Translate, there is no warranty section. If you don't mind paying $100 for a new hair dryer every 6-months, go ahead. Otherwise, save your money and buy a product that lasts a few years.
customer_reviews.author: NYC Girl

customer_reviews.title: Burned my hair...
customer_reviews.text: After about a year and a half of only 1-2 times a week use, the handle started getting super hot while I was drying my hair and would spark when switching from hot to warm temp. My stylist said that the dryer was getting too hot and burned my ends! No wonder my hair has been breaking so much lately. This dryer did reduce my drying time, but there was certainly a cost to that. I don’t believe I would buy this dryer again.
customer_reviews.author: Tiphanie Harkins

customer_reviews.title: mostly great hair dryer
customer_reviews.text: I have medium to thick, below shoulder length hair. It is naturally wavy and can get a bit frizzy in humid weather. It is currently color treated, but healthy and has a keratin treatment. This dryer is super fast and gives me shiny, frizz free results without much effort. The only thing I don’t like about this dryer is the concentrator attachment comes off super easy while you are using it, as does the cover to the air vent on the end. Aside from those 2 issues, a great hairdryer.
customer_reviews.author: VShort

customer_reviews.title: 7 years old and still going strong
customer_reviews.text: It's my only hair dryer, but I don't dry my hair every day. I use it more days than not though. I bought it in September of 2012, and it's still working fine. I came to look for a new filter/mesh piece for the back, as that has ripped. I should admit that it has (unfortunately) fallen from its home in the bathroom numerous times, and hit the tile floor, but it still works great. I thought I paid too much for it 7 years ago, but I've gotten my money out of it, so I can recommend it. It's my only BaByliss, so I don't know if they all hold up this well.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Great choice
customer_reviews.text: My wife says this is the best hair dryer she's ever owned and has commented on that fact a number of times. She says it is easy on her hair. My teen daughter has long hair and she likes it a lot too. I'm happy I spent a little more money and got a good hair dryer for them. If you're a dad, this is a great purchase/gift for the wife and daughters.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce B

customer_reviews.title: The dryer works well, but no diffusers will stay on it, not even BaByliss's
customer_reviews.text: The dryer works well but no diffusers will stay on it. I bought it for personal use and I need to use a diffuser when I dry my hair. So I returned this hair dryer and the different diffusers I bought (with the hopes that one would work, but none did.)
customer_reviews.author: TME

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t last for the money
customer_reviews.text: I spent over a hundred dollars on this blow dryer believing it would last many years. It has blue fire and stinks, and is UNSAFE to use now. See attached pics. It even flows through the plastic housing of the dryer.
customer_reviews.author: Faith Healer

customer_reviews.title: Nice Baby Bliss
customer_reviews.text: I love this blow dryer but as other reviewers have said, the concentrator falls off occasionally. When it does, it's usually pretty hot so handling it to put it back on is a pain. However, that said, it's a great blow dryer. I have medium to long fine hair. I can have my whole head dry in 15 minutes. Even with that design default, I would purchase it again.
customer_reviews.author: Hudson Valley

customer_reviews.title: It lasted less than 2 years
customer_reviews.text: Bought this in March of 2017, it stopped working this week (Nov 2018). I guess based on other reviews, I should be thankful it lasted that long. I was using it for at home use so maybe 5 days a week on average.
customer_reviews.author: NikR

customer_reviews.title: Giving off sparks
customer_reviews.text: It's a good hair dryer, but not 4 or 5-star rating worth as far as my personal experience goes. Especially given the price, I've had much better hair dryers before, just that the one I was using earlier was not available anymore. It does the job, but that's about it. Maybe it works a lot better for others given the number of high ratings, just okay in my experience. Update: Has been giving off sparks lately, fortunately I haven't got burned. Will never buy this again, reducing it to 1 star.
customer_reviews.author: Diya

customer_reviews.title: I'm glad I invested a little more than I usually do
customer_reviews.text: This is an exceptional dryer. I am writing this more than two years after purchase because I wanted to see how long this dryer would last. I've never had a dryer that's gone this long without the engine burning out. It's still going strong. I keep waiting for it to start smoking (the first sign of trouble) and it hasn't happened yet. I'm glad I invested a little more than I usually do, can't recommend it enough.
customer_reviews.author: SL Hoops

customer_reviews.title: So Light and Powerful
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this hair dryer to replace my Solano. The Solano still worked but is about 13 years old and it is heavy. This dryer is much, much lighter and puts out the same about of heated air. It is easy to click the button to make it warm instead of hot air. It is light. I don't seem to have as many frizzies as I did with the Solano -- but again, he Solano is much older and does not have the new tourmaline technology. I would definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Judi

customer_reviews.title: Very powerful and does not damage hair
customer_reviews.text: Amazing blowdryer. I have really thick hair so it usually takes me about an hour to dry my hair with other hairdryers. In 15 minutes I have my hair completely dry with this one. Love it and it has lasted me a long time. No problems at all.
customer_reviews.author: Christy

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and gentle on the hair
customer_reviews.text: Such a great hair dryer that I bought two of them--one for a gift.I love how quickly this dries my hair without over-drying it. My hair is fine strands of wavy color treated dry hair. I have a thick amount of hair though so other dryers take a long time to dry my hair, thus damaging it. This tourmaline dryer is much gentler on my hair and it delivers a softer flow of air. I like that it has three settings for temperature and two settings for the fan.
customer_reviews.author: Wren

customer_reviews.title: Nothing Special...
customer_reviews.text: It really wasn’t any different than other hair dryers I have owned. Maybe a little lighter weight, but I didn’t see noticeably shinier, smoother, faster drying hair. The back filter kept popping off and finally broke. I called the BaByliss customer service and was told there was no replacement part. The dryer died tonight - 3 years almost to the day. I have thick hair, but don’t blow dry everyday, so the dryer wasn’t used excessively. Originally ordered 9/23/15.
customer_reviews.author: Elunia

customer_reviews.title: Best Blowdryer I've Used
customer_reviews.text: I really despise having to blow-dry my hair, but I will say this is by far my favorite blowdryer. Not sure if it's the materials (the tourmaline perhaps?) but it doesn't have a "hot" smell when in use, but rather a crisp metallic scent. I know that may sound crazy but if you've got a lot of hair, you've probably smelled a burn from a blowdryer before. This stays cool to the touch and never smells like a fire hazard. Probably does lessen dry time some, but I find a good blowout spray will really improve that as well. I alternate between air drying and blowdrying my hair, but when I do blow dry I find this worth the investment.
customer_reviews.author: VoteAudrey

customer_reviews.title: NOT worth the price!!
customer_reviews.text: The dryer is very lightweight - which can be good or bad. Good for me as my arms get tired with heavier hair dryers BUT this one just feels cheap despite paying a pretty premium price for a hair dryer. It is fairly powerful on the high setting, but again not the most powerful i've ever used and definitely not worth the premium price. I can't find any reason why the price should be so high, wouldn't be buying this again after it dies...
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Fischer

customer_reviews.title: Broke in 3 years
customer_reviews.text: This was a great dryer that worked well and kept my frizzy hair nice and smooth. But it just stopped working all of the sudden when it's just 3 years old! I expect my blow dryer to last longer than 3 years and pulled out an old one that's not as great but is at least 10 years old and still working fine. I'm very disappointed as I really liked this blow dryer!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Best Hair Dryer Ever
customer_reviews.text: It was time to upgrade my hair dryer. I had always bought a $25 dollar hair dryer from Target, but they kept burning out and were getting too hot and ruining my hair. My hair dresses recommended the Babyliss and I was nervous about spending $99+ on a hair dryer, but it's SO worth it! It's light-weight, doesn't get too hot and dries my hair quickly. HIGHLY Recommended!!
customer_reviews.author: MasGirl

customer_reviews.title: Had a defect
customer_reviews.text: This hair dryer worked well. It dried hair quickly and was quiet during operation. My wife didn't like the way the switches are designed because they work side to side across the handle. She couldn't easily change settings without having to hold the dryer with her other hand. It was while she was changing fan speeds that she noticed the switch was arcing inside the handle housing. A definite hazard that could of had some serious implications if she had gotten shocked. Returned this defective item and got the HSI Professional Hair Dryer instead. She's very happy with a much better dryer now.
customer_reviews.author: Ed A

customer_reviews.title: Good dryer, but not the desired product longevity
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this hair dryer nearly 2 years ago. It has worked well since then - lightweight, quick drying time, no frizz. However, it died yesterday - the heating element overheated and started burning, which made an awful smell. I used it almost every day to style medium-length hair. I was hoping for more life from it - maybe closer to 3 years. A little disappointed that it lasted less than 2.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey Deitch

customer_reviews.title: Great with diffuser to control frizz, fast dry time
customer_reviews.text: This is my first hairdryer which I paid some money for and no regrets. Works great and with the Nano Titanium Difuser, this really controls frizz. I have long, fine but a lot of, curly hair. Also, dry time is a LOT faster than some other dryers I have used.
customer_reviews.author: WestGhent

customer_reviews.title: Cool setting not cool
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed as the cool setting on the toggle switch puts out warmer air the the actual warm setting! It is not as quiet as adding says. It light weight. Returning this one.
customer_reviews.author: D. L.

customer_reviews.title: A great investment!
customer_reviews.text: This hair dryer is exactly what my wife was looking for. She has very thick hair and had trouble with conventional driers.Not only did a regular cheap hair dryer take a long time, they would overheat and need to cool down partway through the process. This think is reasonably quite and drys her hair in less than half the time.
customer_reviews.author: M. Hilovsky

customer_reviews.title: My Favorite Dryer...
customer_reviews.text: This is my third BaByliss Pro and will buy another if and when I need it. The shape, size and wattage are just right for me. With daily use, I'm not surprised that every few years one of these break down. There has been a wide range of prices - between $50 and $100 but that's life. Sometimes that's just an Amazon thing - the price can vary in one day easily. Anyway - great dryer, very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: C. Munoz

customer_reviews.title: Effective
customer_reviews.text: This is my second one in 10 years- I really like it. I have thick-medium length hair and this dryer dries my hair within minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Regina Y smith

customer_reviews.title: Not Overly Impressed
customer_reviews.text: After reading the reviews, I expected to have a sensational drying experience, to shave minutes off my ~5 minute dry time. Nope. My last dryer was a typical Conair 1875 that folded and had a retractable cord, taking up a lot less space on the vanity. It worked fine, gave me several years of service before it got that burning smell, and I was content. When I started looking online, and saw all the rave reviews, I decided to splurge and get a BaByliss. It too works fine. But it cost me twice as much and doesn't do anything better. So it's a 3.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila McGee-Smith

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product! Does all claims said and the color and finishes are swell. I don't fear it will rub off and look bad like the red one did. Easy to use, very speedy and gentle on my fine hair.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Reyna

customer_reviews.title: Heavy, but long-lasting
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product 4 years ago. I'm writing this review because there's been a lot of reviews about this only lasting 2 years. To be fair, I only blow dry my hair 2 to 3 times per week. But, it seems to be going strong with no problems. The only thing I really don't like about this hair dryer is it seems to be a bit heavy.
customer_reviews.author: roxanne eberle

customer_reviews.title: Powerful Frizz Free Blow Dryer
customer_reviews.text: I love this blow dryer. My old dryer literally blew apart while I was using it. My husband convinced me to buy a cheap dryer (one blow dryer is like another). After one use it went back in the box and returned. I researched and this dryer is in the top 10 for 2014. And it definitely delivers. Power, no frizz and choice of settings. I have owned a Babyliss straightner for 5 years and it is still just as powerful as the day I bought it. Hope this dryer has that same longevity!!
customer_reviews.author: AWL4Sassy

customer_reviews.title: Hmmmmm
customer_reviews.text: OK, well, I ordered this because it got such glowing reviews and I like my old Conair better!!! It just doesn't do the job for me. Not sure why. I have baby fine hair and my Conair helps it look fuller and hold a curl when I scrunch it while drying. This one, nice and lightweight as it is, has the same effect as other dryers I've used, such a my travel dryer, in that it just leaves my hair very listless and straight. Bizarre, I know.
customer_reviews.author: Glinda

customer_reviews.title: Smells like it's on fire
customer_reviews.text: It worked great for a little over 2 years but started smelling like it was burning the other day and I can see a blue flame inside when it's on. The outside gets extremely hot and I'm afraid to use it. You would think a hair dryer at this price would last longer. I have had cheap blow dryers last longer. Super disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Aniala

customer_reviews.title: High quality and flexibility
customer_reviews.text: I had to buy a new hair dryer when my old one burned out. I consulted my hairdresser before buying and I'm glad I did. I love all the different combinations of heat and airspeed. My hair definitely dries faster and the cooler temps mean it is easier to style. I also love the long cord since my outlet is a bit of a stretch. Overall, very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace my other baby bliss. I like it but it’s heavier then my older one and doesn’t dry as quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cold air very helpful
customer_reviews.text: Love the cold air, but you have to hold the button down the whole time to keep it cold, so that becomes tiresome. My stylist says use the hot setting to get my hair 90% dry then finish (in sections) with cold. this technique has worked to eliminate frizz (whether I am straightening or going curly).
customer_reviews.author: The Gentry's

customer_reviews.title: NOT a magical item, but a very good sturdy hairdryer nonetheless
customer_reviews.text: This is my second purchase of this item. My other one is three years old and still growing strong, but it doesn't hurt to have a back up. It won't change give you "smooth, shiny mermaid like tresses" unless you already those to begin with (who comes up with that stuff?) but it does decrease drying time and is very sturdy. I travel frequently, this dryer stands up to being thrown around in a suitcase.
customer_reviews.author: cinnamonster

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and lots of drying power
customer_reviews.text: This is the second time I bought the hair dryer as I wore the first one out after many years. It is a great dryer. Lightweight and lots of power.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon M Krumme

customer_reviews.title: Best I've every had
customer_reviews.text: I have had many blow dryers but this is my favorite. Keep my hair shiny and dries fast. I have other BabyLiss products and find that the cost is justified. These products last and last and produce excellent results.
customer_reviews.author: Libsy

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: I received my new hair dryer over a week ago and I must say I absolutely love it. It is not as loud as the ones I've purchased at the beauty supply store and at Wal-Mart in the past. It dries my hair really fast, but I do have really fine, thin hair. I received this purchase when I expected it to arrive. So far, all is great!
customer_reviews.author: LISA A ANGELL

customer_reviews.title: ... my daughter and at this time she is very satisfied and hasn't had any issues with the dryer
customer_reviews.text: Bougth this for my daughter and at this time she is very satisfied and hasn't had any issues with the dryer!
customer_reviews.author: R. Kunkel

customer_reviews.title: My absolute favorite dryer. It's light
customer_reviews.text: My absolute favorite dryer. It's light, the cord is long and it dries my hair quickly, so it's less frizzy. Absolutely worth the cost. I used to think the flat-iron was the most important tool, but I now know it's all in the dryer.
customer_reviews.author: Tabatha Alcina

customer_reviews.title: BaByliss Pro TT 5000 dryer
customer_reviews.text: This is my first purchase of a non-super-store hair dryer. I have thick, corse, wavy, dry hair so I was immediately drawn to this due to the reviews I have read. So far it's been living up to most of the claims. My hair dries more quickly and it does seem softer and less damaged. The straightening effect that some have claimed unfortunately hasn't happened with my very stubborn "frizzy, curl, wave" type of hair. The location of the button is a bit tricky and I still keep hitting the heat to cool on accident but it's not a deal breaker. I did check out some Troumaline dryers at a discount store and this price is comparable to those brands.
customer_reviews.author: Keya

customer_reviews.title: Too much of a good thing?
customer_reviews.text: This is a super powerful hairdryer, so if you are interested in blowing the moisture out of your hair at maximum velocity, this is the dryer for your. I have long fine hair and this dryer is so powerful, I get big tangles nearly every time I use it and have to stop in the middle of drying to detangle. That being said, it seems very well made and light weight, so big plusses for that.
customer_reviews.author: JocelynK

customer_reviews.title: I have used it every other day and it works like a charm
customer_reviews.text: I am a real cost saving person. Lets start with that! I had the opportunity to try this at a friends house and it dried my hair much more quickly and efficiently than any other hair dryer I have ever used. I took a pic and went on line looking. I have used it every other day and it works like a charm! My daughter has super long hair and enough hair for three people, and it quickly dries her hair as well. Highly recommend and worth the extra money.
customer_reviews.author: Cooking Twin

customer_reviews.title: Quiet Hair Dryer
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with the quality of the BaByliss Pro Hair Dryer. It is quiet compared to other hair dryers I have used. It is very easy to hold because it is so light. I was worried that I would accidentally turn off or switch the setting because of the placement of the buttons, but this has not happened. In fact, the cool button is so easy to access that I use it often. It also seems to take less time to dry my hair with this dryer. I would recommend this product to anyone who wants to step up to a more professional dryer with great results.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Stoddard

customer_reviews.title: Great hair dryer! Makes hair smooth and silky
customer_reviews.text: I generally never bother to write reviews but I just had to tell others about this dryer. I have baby fine, color treated hair that gets dry and frizzy. I spend a lot of money on products to help smooth my hair but they don't keep my hair looking good all day. I have to say that I was skeptical that this dryer would make much of a difference but thought for the price it couldn't hurt to give it a try. I couldn't believe the difference in my hair the very first time I used it. My hair was smoother and shinier than I can ever remember. And that's with no additional products. Wow!!!! I absolutely LOVE this drier.
customer_reviews.author: Sharklady

customer_reviews.title: This dryer has a new, positive effect on my hair!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because my hairdresser kept telling me that you get what you pay for. She was right. It’s not that much more money, either, considering you use it daily. I don’t know how it does it, but it leaves my hair silky and smooth — totally different from less expensive dryers I’ve bought in the past. I just never thought it mattered. Well, apparently it does. I went back to Amazon and bought the BaByliss hair straightener and it’s just as awesome!
customer_reviews.author: SODigitalDiva

customer_reviews.title: The best blow dryer ever!
customer_reviews.text: I am a hairstylist and this is my favorite hair dryer! I am on my 3rd one of the exact same model but over 11 years. This dryer is lightweight and very powerful. The power of it and the high heat allows for a quick dry and gets the frizz out. I highly recommend this dryer. Just a side note, when I got this for the first time I was at a hair show. I tried about 100 dryers looking for one that was lightweight and powerful. This was the winner and does not disappoint!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah W

customer_reviews.title: Love this hair dryer
customer_reviews.text: Love this hair dryer! Being a hair stylist I am super picky about blow dryers. This dryer is amazing it gets super hot dryes the hair fast and it not heavy. This dryer gets used everyday all day and I have not had any issues with it. Great product arrived on time!
customer_reviews.author: Stylist

customer_reviews.title: Best Hairdryer, Hands Down!
customer_reviews.text: I first came across this hairdryer in our hotel room at the Palms in Las Vegas, and after just one use I had to buy one for myself. I had a great hairdryer already, but I guess I didn't know what I was missing until I tried this one. My hair has never been smoother and softer (less frizz and flyaways) and drying time is cut in half. I love it! (~Anthony's wife~)
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Bought in 2012 and still going strong
customer_reviews.text: This has been a great hair dryer for me. I’ve used it almost everyday for several years. I also had another Babyliss dryer before this one that lasted me about 7 years. I’m happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Serena Benz

customer_reviews.title: Light weight, easy to use, but not powerful enough.
customer_reviews.text: Pros: It is lightweight and easy to use. Cons: Not powerful enough. I had a different Bayliss Blowdryer, that was much heavier, but dried my hair much faster. As a mommy of two and getting up very early, I need something that will dry my hair faster. I am returning this product.
customer_reviews.author: Mommy NYC

customer_reviews.title: I question it’s authenticity
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in August and it quit working on me in November...I have bought this brand from a professional hair supply store before and it had lasted WAY longer than that for me! I would tend to question the authenticity of this hair dryer sold on Amazon and not sold from a professional salon or professional supply store.
customer_reviews.author: Mandi Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Hair Dryer
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Babyliss hair dryer. I like that it is lightweight and my other one lasted over 10 years.
customer_reviews.author: Tina S. Oliver

customer_reviews.title: Concentrator gets very hot, cool settings don't work
customer_reviews.text: I thought I'd get an impressive hair dryer at this price, but it's nothing special. When I dropped it and the concentrator fell off (I'm not complaining - I did drop it), I noticed how hot the concentrator was. I couldn't pick it up with my bare hands. That concerned me, so I reattached it and turned the dryer to "cool" in an attempt to cool the concentrator. I never felt any cool air. I then tried holding down the COLD button, and again, the air never got cooler than warm.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Better than we expected
customer_reviews.text: We really wanted a dryer with a white cord (which there aren't many to choose from), so we chose this brand. What a nice dryer. It's fairly quiet, too. Also, it has an attachment for focusing the air to a smaller area. And best of all is the easily pressed button for immediate 'COOL' air to come out. As soon as you are ready for warmer air again, let go of the button. Simple. Oh, and another plus: the cord is extra long so it reaches my side of the mirror! Everyone in our family really likes this dryer.
customer_reviews.author: k fountain

customer_reviews.title: Great dryer
customer_reviews.text: Basically love it. Sometimes the hi and low switch without prompting but love it
customer_reviews.author: Linda Donlea

customer_reviews.title: ... hairdryer as its the one my hairdresser uses and recommended. It does a good job
customer_reviews.text: I bought this hairdryer as its the one my hairdresser uses and recommended. It does a good job, but it has some annoyances. The high setting is too high too high. It like blasts my hair and tangles it, so I have to use low which just doesn't feel high enough. Wish there was a medium setting or the high was a little lower. I constantly hit the buttons while using it, switching the heat off, etc. All it all, it's not a bad hair dryer for the price. But I'm not in love with it.
customer_reviews.author: Meg

customer_reviews.title: Cord is long enough to wrap around a house. ...
customer_reviews.text: Cord is long enough to wrap around a house. They should shorten it by half. Also, the temperature and speed switches are too close to fingers and thumb to where you can accidentally turn it off or change the temperature. And it doesn't lessen flyaways.
customer_reviews.author: L. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Best blowdryer ever!
customer_reviews.text: Your search for the best blowdryer has ended! Get this if you want to cut your drying time in half! I have thick long hair and it takes a half hour to dry my hair. This dryer can do it in 10-15 mins! So worth the money! I researched all the others and found that this is the best bang for your buck. Cheap hairdryers are loud and heavy. This is not so loud compared to the $20-30 dryers and it is lightweight. Only thing I would change is the location of the buttons. Other than that this is the perfect dryer for me!
customer_reviews.author: Shopaholic

customer_reviews.title: Great dryer, awkward to hold
customer_reviews.text: Super fast dry, however it is awkward to hold without pressing the control buttons on the handle.
customer_reviews.author: Debra K. Caddell

customer_reviews.title: Best hairdryer I've ever used!
customer_reviews.text: I have long, thick hair, and I usually have to blow it dry with a round brush and then use a flat iron to ensure that it is all the way straight. The whole process takes around 25 minutes. This hairdryer has changed all that! It is incredibly fast, yet also gentle. Now, my hair is dry in less than 10 minutes, and I don't usually need a flat iron at all. And (even better), it has refuted my boyfriend's long-held belief that hairdryers are "noise machines." I would definitely recommend this product to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Reiman

customer_reviews.title: WASTE OF MONEY!!
customer_reviews.text: Where is the NEGATIVE stars button...delivered September 1st completely burnt up February 4th....not even used daily!!! What a waste of money....if you are thinking of buying this KEEP SHOPPING!!! NOTHING TO SEE HERE JUST CRAPPY PRODUCT
customer_reviews.author: Chad Rannells

customer_reviews.title: best every
customer_reviews.text: this has great speeds, is lightweight, and easy to hold. I'm short and have short arms, which causes me to have trouble finding things that fit. And i know that seems silly, but i have long, thick hair. In order to roll the brush and hold the blowdryer, I've found that it needs to be smallish yet powerful. This hairdryer seems nicer than the one my hairstylist uses or at least on par with her hairdryer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: WOW!
customer_reviews.text: I thought I couldn't be impressed by a hair dryer but WOW! This is fast! It does not get too hot, the directional mouth provides the right amount of intensity and it is fairly light weight. When I used the black attachment it got WAY overheated so I won't be making that mistake again. It got so hot I couldn't even touch it to take it off. I'm afraid it could melt. The dryer alone though is highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Tien Brunelle

customer_reviews.title: Built solid, five stars for five years!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this hair dryer for my girlfriend because I was frustrated with how loud her old one was. I still wouldn't classify this as a quiet hairdryer, but is a considerable improvement over the previous one. She seems pretty happy with it as well. Update: This hairdryer has been going strong for almost six years now with daily use. It really dries well so I'm giving it the bump to five stars.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: 3 Strikes and you're out (of my house) !
customer_reviews.text: Strike #1 - Product arrived defective - The concentrator would not fit on the the dryer. Strike # 2- The heat/warm buttons are poorly placed inside the handle. Thus, you inadvertently will be flipping those buttons as you use the dryer. Strike # 3 - The dryer does not get hot enough..Warm, yes..Hot enough, NO ! Hence, we printed the return label and waved bye-bye to this mediocre, (at best), dryer.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Good Babyliss
customer_reviews.text: Over the Summer I found that EVERYONE who used my old hairdryer hated it. I bought this one and all the girls adore it. I do notice that the heat isn't as hot as the old one and it seems to smooth the hair shaft without losing the curl. That's a plus with me because I no longer color or attempt to straighten my locks. It's got plenty of directed air power too.
customer_reviews.author: Dustbunny

customer_reviews.title: Good dryer; stops after warranty
customer_reviews.text: My wife has always loved BaByliss hairdryers. But once again, shortly after the warranty is passed, it shorted out. We bought about 26 months ago; the warranty is 24 months. Same thing happened with previous BaByliss. She's now looking for a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love this Hair Dryer
customer_reviews.text: I had a good ION hair dryer but it had become very heavy to handle I went looking for a new one. I really love this one. It is lightweight, the cord is long but not too long, it is easy to store and very attractive in white. Additionally my hair shines like crazy and I've gotten numerous compliments on my hair since I started using it. I have already recommended it to others. I think this one is a real keeper.
customer_reviews.author: LJK

customer_reviews.title: Great dryer
customer_reviews.text: Bought this a couple of Christmases ago for my wife. She really likes it and it is still going strong. She said it makes her hair look and feel great so whatever natural ions do, they do it well. It is light and powerful and got me a few compliments for picking out such a nice hair dryer even though I am a man.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: This hairdryer comes without an important part.
customer_reviews.text: Why doesn't this hair dryer come with the vent on the end that directs the air to specific spots instead of all over the place???? I've purchased two and now realize I'm disappointed!!!!!!!!!!! I need one!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Lasted 14 months
customer_reviews.text: Had a previous Baybliss (ceramic) which I had about 4 years, still a backup. I decided to give the tourmaline a try. It lasted just over a year using 3/4 times a week. Do not spend the money if you want to keep it more than a year.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Better than drugstore
customer_reviews.text: Ok so I just used this hair dryer for the first time. I really wanted to venture out from my regular Revlon hair dryer. I never had a problem with drugstore hair dryers I guess I just wondered what all the fuss was about. I didn't want to go too high end so I figured this was a good price point. I will say my hair definitely seems less frizzy after blow drying. I don't know that it really took less time to blow dry but I do feel that it is healthier. I wasn't sure if I would keep it but I think I will. It is light weight too
customer_reviews.author: Deidra

customer_reviews.title: First time BaByliss costumer
customer_reviews.text: Always finding a new hairdryer is such a daunting task. Especially since there are so many brands out there, but after my previous hairdryer lasted me only one year and two months (thus the warranty was not active anymore )I was determined to find something that would last me a little bit longer. This product is lightweight and does have a decent amount of force. It was cheaper than my previous hairdryer and so far I am a happy customer. I hope that it lasts me a while!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda B.

customer_reviews.title: For dry frizzy flyaway hair
customer_reviews.text: To beat the band, awesome for people with dry frizzy flyaway hair. When my hair is wet, I let it dry on its own for 30 min, then I blow dry quick with this dryer. If never seen anything like it, I have calm hair with not much effort!
customer_reviews.author: Vinci

customer_reviews.title: Thanks!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome blow dryer. I never paid any attention to a blow dryer until I tried this one at the Mirage Las Vegas. Bought the same one here, and love it. It was delivered quickly and the price was right. Thanks!!
customer_reviews.author: C Morris

customer_reviews.title: Light, powerful, efficient
customer_reviews.text: I have thick, moderately curly hair and have been straightening it for 15 years (you always want what you don't have). In that time I have gone through my fair share of dryers. This dryer was impressive. Small and light. Comfortable grip. Moves air very well but also produces enough heat for efficient drying which other dryers have not accomplished. I also found that I'm using my flat iron less after drying because my hair has been sufficiently straightened AND smoothed with this dryer and a round brush.
customer_reviews.author: M. Monteiro

customer_reviews.title: Great hair dryer, but.....
customer_reviews.text: This is my 3rd purchase of this dryer — love it!!! Never dries out hair and dries my hair very fast. I would have given it a 5 rating but the dryer only lasts about 1 year and then breaks down.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's just as good as they say
customer_reviews.text: Bought this dryer after trying out my sister-in-law's BaByliss. I have a head full of frizzy messy hair which I attempt to straighten every day for work. This thing dries my hair in half the time as my conair, and leaves it smoother and straighter than I've ever seen it. If you want smooth shiny hair, go buy it now!
customer_reviews.author: TroJen

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this hair dryer. It dries my hair in no time at all.
customer_reviews.author: Heather McDonald

customer_reviews.title: BEST HAIRDRYER
customer_reviews.text: I did a lot of research before ordering a new hairdryer. My last one was a decade old travel hairdryer. I asked my hairstylist and she recommended a babyliss. I purchased this one, and it works great. I have thin hair but A LOT of it, and this dries my hair really fast.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: No Issues
customer_reviews.text: I got this dryer as a replacement. It works well, gets hot enough for what I need and gets my hair dryer faster than my old model. I have taken it with me when I traveled and it packs well since it is slightly smaller than my previous dryer. It is still a bit heavier than I would like, but overall for the features and performance I have had so far I would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonian

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't Recommend
customer_reviews.text: My wife asked for this last Christmas because her hairstylist uses the exact same one at the salon. In less than a year it's not heating as well, and my wife asked for a different one this Christmas. For the price I paid for this, I would not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Kungfu

customer_reviews.title: This is a great hair dryer with an extra long cord
customer_reviews.text: This is a great hair dryer with an extra long cord. I bought this because I was tired of buying cheap dryers and them breaking after a few months. I've had this one for over a year, and I would recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Gina S.

customer_reviews.title: seems overpriced as cool setting isn't really cool unless you hold cold shot ...
customer_reviews.text: Works OK, seems overpriced as cool setting isn't really cool unless you hold cold shot button, annoying.. Also the low fan setting is still higher than I'd like.. All in all an OK dryer for $40.00, the kicker is I paid over $60.00, I'm thinking my 7 year old Conair dryer that I gave to my daughter was a much better value!!!
customer_reviews.author: John Niles

customer_reviews.title: Awesome dryer
customer_reviews.text: This is a great hairdryer. It cuts blow drying my hair in 1/2 the time it used to. I don't have long hair (slightly past my shoulders) but it is thick. After using this hair dryer I no longer cringe at this part of my readying routine.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Fav !
customer_reviews.text: I love this hairdryer. Normally I go for the cheap drugstore kind but I decided that I was worth a better hairdryer. I researched as much as I could and ended up buying this hairdryer. I've had it for over 8 months and I still enjoy using it without any regrets ! I def recommend this item !
customer_reviews.author: Mai

customer_reviews.title: Love it!! Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: We bought in Dec 2015 and it lasted almost 4 years with no problems. Now it finally broke- dropped and banged in suitcase countless times. Going to buy same one!!
customer_reviews.author: jmaya

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Dryer!!
customer_reviews.text: This hair dryer is AMAZING!!! I have very thick, course, curly, long(to the middle of my waist) hair and it takes me forever to dry and flat iron my hair usually. Not with this dryer! It got my hair silky, smooth, and shiny in about 10 minutes. It did such an amazing job that I don't even need to flat iron. I highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: G. Hall

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: love this hair dry. nice looking. light weight. drys fast. I have pretty long thick hair. takes well under 10 minutes. if i left my hair air dry for a bit (about an hour) then it only takes a 2 or 3 minutes to give it that nice smooth look. was considering another smaller one also for travel (red), but this one is small enough i could also be used for travel. recommended.
customer_reviews.author: R BTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Must have!
customer_reviews.text: I had a perfectly good hair dryer but after using this at The Mirage hotel, I had to have one for home! It's sleek, lightweight and targets my hair - easy to use with one hand. I even travel with it now even though all hotels provide hair dryers. The only thing I would change is giving it a retractable cord but I'll get over it!
customer_reviews.author: D. M. Huhn

customer_reviews.title: Meh, nothing special.
customer_reviews.text: I had read rave reviews about this dryer, promising me gorgeous, life changing hair. Well, it is fast drying, but nothing special. Hoping it lasts more than a couple years since it was double the price I've spent on past dryers.
customer_reviews.author: Janis B.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Used this at the Mirage in Vegas and loved it so bought out own. Excellent dryer!
customer_reviews.author: LuckyLego

customer_reviews.title: The hairdryer stopped working after less than 6 months of ...
customer_reviews.text: The hairdryer stopped working after less than 6 months of use. There is no return button on Amazon for this product and the link to return it via Babyliss provided by Amazon opens a page stating simply: common.redirect_permanent.message null. Not sure where to go from here - seems the purchase was an expensive mistake as I'm not the only one this has happened to.
customer_reviews.author: RafaSanta

customer_reviews.title: Quiet, quick, and has a nice long cord.
customer_reviews.text: I love this! It is so much quieter than any hair dryer I've owned and it dries my hair quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Meadow

customer_reviews.title: Buying this one as a back up since I can't ...
customer_reviews.text: Buying this one as a back up since I can't risk having a blow dryer die on me with no replacement. But my first one is still going strong after more than 4 years!
customer_reviews.author: Leah L.

customer_reviews.title: Great dryer!
customer_reviews.text: Love this dryer! Lightweight, easy to use, dries my hair very fast without frizz. Happy to have a great dryer to bring while traveling that doesn't add a lot of weight to my luggage.
customer_reviews.author: E. McGee

product_meta.title: BaBylissPRO Tourmaline Titanium 5000 Dryer
product_meta.description:
The Tourmaline Titanium technology of the 1900 Watt BaBylissPRO Tourmaline Titanium 5000 hair dryer releases millions of ions for bright, longer-lasting shine. Far-infrared heat helps hair dry faster. This lightweight dryer features 6 heat settings & a cool shot button for a wide range of drying & styling options. Great for all hair types including thick & coarse hair, this blow dryer helps reveal shiny, healthy-looking hair.

BRAND STORY
BaBylissPRO is the world’s leading producer of innovative, high-performance professional styling tools. Chosen by hairdressers, barbers, and clients everywhere, BabylissPRO styling tools are versatile and engineered to last.

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
